page.title: 06HOUSING IN SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: In this area there are many{types of {house}such as large detached,semi- detached,terraced,and also bungalows and flats. The price range is from {Â£24,000 to Â£160,000.}The cheapest properties are flats which are situated near the town centre whilst the more expensive houses are to be found on the Aldwick Road private estates.Because development of the area began in 1768 there are many {Regency and Georgian houses, especially along the sea front and in The Steyne. There is also evidence of the{Victorian}era.The strangest house in this area is{The White Tower}in Aldwick Road, built by John Hawes in 1886.It is four storeys high and the windows are fitted at varying heights to give the impression that the building is higher than twelve metres.
